title: Method Overloading - Advanced
description: Master method overloading by creating multiple methods with the same name but different parameter types and counts. Build flexible, polymorphic code that handles different data types elegantly.
learningObjectives: Understand method overloading and when to use it
Create multiple methods with the same name
Use different parameter types (int, double, String)
Understand how Java determines which method to call
Apply overloading to real-world scenarios (printing, calculations)
